pullRequest.title: Ensure ordering of Config items when an extension contains multiple Config classes

commit.message:
Ensure ordering of Config items when an extension contains multiple Config classes

Fixes: #8147

nodes.bodyText:
We have this info here - 
  
    
      quarkus/core/processor/src/main/java/io/quarkus/annotation/processor/generate_doc/ConfigDoItemFinder.java
    
    
         Line 58
      in
      c8b4f89
    
    
    
    

        
          
           final List<ConfigDocItem> configDocItems = recursivelyFindConfigItems(element, configRootInfo.getName(), 
        
    
  

 with configRootInfo.getName(), maybe we can pass/set (possibly recursively) this from there instead of computing this?
